review_data.title: Simple, but very nice and relaxing
review_data.content: Cute little lake-side bistro - very limited choice of food (fish and chips, burgers, salads, flammkuchen), but freshly prepared and good. Service is fast and amiable. And the location is just very nice: next to the lake, good view, some shade... Overall, i'd come back.

review_data.title: Perfect location at the lake
review_data.content: The location of Piazza is great just at the lake promenade. They are only open from May until September. The menu card is simple but good - salads, fish and chips, wraps and sandwiches. A good choice if you are looking for a nice lake-front...More
